law.text:
Any noise control plan adopted pursuant to KRS 224.30-175 may include, but not be limited to, the following:
Noise levels which will not be exceeded in specified zones or other designated areas,
The designation of a noise control officer,
Plans, and procedures necessary for the implementation of plans, for transportation systems within the jurisdiction,
Plans concerning land use within the jurisdiction,
Requirements of site design necessary for the approval of any construction within the jurisdiction,
The implementation procedures of the noise control plan and the relation of the noise control plan to other plans within the jurisdiction, and
Strategies for assuring compliance with state and federal noise regulations.
law.history: 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 13, effective June 21, 1974.
